recommendations: Jason Pinto ‚ÄúIt was a privilege working with Ashish while building our tech team during it's initial stages because of his patience and availability for all queries in making the hiring process smoother. I'm happy to have been able to learn a lot from him and I know for a fact that he is a great addition to any team he becomes a part of. As a CTO, he always maintained a friendly and approachable demeanor. Ashish, for all the great things coming your way, I wish you nothing but the best!‚Äù

Shravika Jain ‚ÄúWorking alongside Ashish has truly been a pleasure for me. He's got a real knack for all things tech, and I've learned a lot from him about the world of AI. He's also got a good sense of humor, which makes his insights about tech and other things even more interesting. He always allowed me to explore the creative side of my writing and I can undoubtedly say that he is overall a great leader.‚Äù
